entity.name: artresource
entity.query: select id, datecreated, location, institution from artresource where enabled=true
entity.deltaImportQuery: select id, datecreated, location, institution from artresource where id=${dataimporter.delta.id} and enabled=true
entity.deltaQuery: select gr.resources_id as id from gameround_resource gr join gameround r on gr.gamerounds_id=r.id where r.startdate > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}'
entity.deletedPkQuery: select id from artresource where enabled=false

entity.name: artistEntity
entity.query: select coalesce(forename || ' ' || surname, surname, forename) as artist from person p join artresource ar on ar.artist_id=p.id where ar.id='${artresource.id}'

entity.name: title
entity.query: select title from artresourcetitle where resource_id='${artresource.id}'

entity.name: teaser
entity.query: select description from artresourceteaser where resource_id='${artresource.id}'

entity.name: imagepath
entity.query: select s.url || a.path as imagepath from artresource a join source s on a.source_id=s.id where a.id='${artresource.id}'

entity.name: tag
entity.query: select name as tag from tag t join tagging tg on t.id=tg.tag_id where tg.resource_id=${artresource.id} and exists (select tg2.id from tagging tg2 where tg2.resource_id = ${artresource.id} and tg2.tag_id = tg.tag_id and tg2.id != tg.id)

entity.name: tag_de
entity.query: select name as tag_de from tag t join tagging tg on t.id=tg.tag_id where tg.resource_id=${artresource.id} and language='de' and exists (select tg2.id from tagging tg2 where tg2.resource_id = ${artresource.id} and tg2.tag_id = tg.tag_id and tg2.id != tg.id)

entity.name: tag_en
entity.query: select name as tag_en from tag t join tagging tg on t.id=tg.tag_id where tg.resource_id=${artresource.id} and language='en' and exists (select tg2.id from tagging tg2 where tg2.resource_id = ${artresource.id} and tg2.tag_id = tg.tag_id and tg2.id != tg.id)

entity.name: tag_fr
entity.query: select name as tag_fr from tag t join tagging tg on t.id=tg.tag_id where tg.resource_id=${artresource.id} and language='fr' and exists (select tg2.id from tagging tg2 where tg2.resource_id = ${artresource.id} and tg2.tag_id = tg.tag_id and tg2.id != tg.id)

entity.name: tagrating
entity.query: select name as tag from tag t join tagrating tr on t.id=tr.tag_id where tr.resource_id=${artresource.id} and rating > 1.0

entity.name: tagrating_de
entity.query: select name as tag_de from tag t join tagrating tr on t.id=tr.tag_id where tr.resource_id=${artresource.id} and language='de' and rating > 1.0

entity.name: tagrating_en
entity.query: select name as tag_en from tag t join tagrating tr on t.id=tr.tag_id where tr.resource_id=${artresource.id} and language='en' and rating > 1.0

entity.name: tagrating_fr
entity.query: select name as tag_fr from tag t join tagrating tr on t.id=tr.tag_id where tr.resource_id=${artresource.id} and language='fr' and rating > 1.0
